name: Fluento
description:
Fluento is a mobile & web development company with headquarters in Sosnowiec (Poland).
We build user-oriented applications that fit any industry and budget.
Core competencies:
Mobile Development (Android)
Web Development
PHP
UI/UX Design
Appstore optimization (ASO)
Specialty: android development
Our passion for work reflects our values & produces delightful experiences to our customers.
As a true partner for Startups & Enterprises, we bring our years of insights and domain expertise that will add a lot of value to your app solution.
Visit our Website for more information.
